monsterResistances: Damage Resistances bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
monsterCImmunities: Condition Immunities exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious
monsterLanguages: Languages Auran, understands Common but doesn't speak it
monsterSpecials: Faultless Tracker. The stalker is given a quarry by its summoner. The stalker knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The stalker also knows the location of its summoner.
monsterActions: Multiattack. The stalker makes two slam attacks.
Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
